This historic city center charms visitors with live performances, unique restaurants, and street vendors. Enjoy local cuisine at Silvertone, take a relaxing stroll through Boston Commons, or catch a show at the stunning Boston Opera House.
notes: There's limited parking in the area, but there's plenty to discover within walking distance - check out your Neighborhood Guide for suggestions! Your Sonder's keys will be found in a lockbox and we'll be sending you detailed access information three days before your stay. If you need any help, just give us a call.  Please note, this building is located next door to the Orpheum Theatre so you may encounter some noise and crowds. In the case of the front entrance being blocked for a larger show, there is an alternative entrance around the corner on Winter Street.

house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I
host_about: Sonder is reimagining the way people travel. Now in 20+ cities, we’ve been featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and named 2019’s most innovative hospitality brand by Fast Company. We’ve taken the best parts of home and hotel and combined them into an entirely new experience. All of our spaces are uniquely designed, have 24/7 guest support, and contain all the essentials you need for an impeccable stay. No matter what you’re looking for, there’s a Sonder for you.

A welcome packet will be sent two weeks prior to arrival, it contains all info needed for check in and during your stay. 3 days prior to arrival, Arrival instructions will be sent, provides codes for keyless entry and a navigator that will take you to the property.Professional non-smoking building, parties not allowed. Please note, Boston is an old city, buildings were built in the early 1900's , you may notice some settlement in the building.
transit: Property is located in the center of Boston, easy access to almost anywhere. Walking distance to Green line, Red line, Orange line and several bus routes.  1/2 mile away from Boston Common, The Boston Public Gardens, The Old State House and Newbury Street! Less than 1/2 mile to South Station, Boylston stop, and 1/3 mile to Tufts Medical!
access: Guests have access to the whole apartment
interaction: Welcome to STARS of Boston (short term apartment rental solutions of Boston) ,  we offer several short term apartment options. Our team tries to provide personal and attentive service to our guests. We are local, respect guests privacy, but always available in needed. After your reservation has been confirmed, we will email you a contract for you to review and sign. The contract will just outline the basic house rules.

It is just a few minutes walk to the major subway lines. (red line: Park Street, Downtown, Charles River, South Station, orange line: Tufts Medical Center, Chinatown green line: Boylston Street) and close to attractions like the Aquarium, Theater District, Chinatown, Beacon Hill and the many stores and department stores located nearby.
space: Come home to this cozy and comfortable 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment right next to the commons. You can see it from your window! name: Historical 1BR Modern Downtown Loft, All 5 Stars!
summary: Location, location and character! This pre-Civil War loft with soaring 12-foot ceilings is located on Broad Street in the Waterfront, steps from the Greenway and within walking distance of Boston's top attractions. It features all the luxury of a high end home; chef's kitchen, wood floors, central A/C; but retains the character of the historical building. This professionally designed home has all the amenities of a boutique hotel, fully stocked with everything you need for an exceptional stay.
space: This second floor industrial loft unit, serviced by an elevator, features architectural details like beamed ceilings and a brick wall from the original, 160-year old warehouse. There is a living room, complete with 50-inch UHD 4K TV, dining area with suspended table, bathroom with tub/shower, king bedroom with 65-inch UHD 4K TV, full-size washer and dryer and fully-stocked kitchen with coffee and tea station - everything you need for an exceptional stay. With so many restaurants and shops nearby, you can truly live like a local and experience the history of Boston just by walking around (Walk Score of 97!). Bring your whole family (sleeps up to 2 adults and 2 kids), go for a stroll along the Rose Kennedy Greenway, and walk to the most popular activities in Boston: * Waterfront, Rose Kennedy Greenway (less than 1 minute walk) * Faneuil Hall Marketplace, Old State House (5 min.) * New England Aquarium, HarborWalk (5 min.) * North End, Public Market, Boston Tea Party Ships & Museum (10 mi
description: Location, location and character! This pre-Civil War loft with soaring 12-foot ceilings is located on Broad Street in the Waterfront, steps from the Greenway and within walking distance of Boston's top attractions. It features all the luxury of a high end home; chef's kitchen, wood floors, central A/C; but retains the character of the historical building. This professionally designed home has all the amenities of a boutique hotel, fully stocked with everything you need for an exceptional stay. This second floor industrial loft unit, serviced by an elevator, features architectural details like beamed ceilings and a brick wall from the original, 160-year old warehouse. There is a living room, complete with 50-inch UHD 4K TV, dining area with suspended table, bathroom with tub/shower, king bedroom with 65-inch UHD 4K TV, full-size washer and dryer and fully-stocked kitchen with coffee and tea station - everything you need for an exceptional stay. With so many restaurants and shops nearby,
neighborhood_overview: Surrounded by the Greenway, Boston Harbor, Faneuil Hall, North End and Financial District neighborhoods, the Waterfront is known for being a safe place to live, boasting one of the lowest crime rates in the Boston area. The thriving community; consisting of life long residents, young professionals, and families; come together to create a fun, active, and friendly place where people enjoy knowing their neighbors and taking advantage of the various restaurants, parks, and popular activities nearby. While most cities' financial districts shut down at night, Boston's stays busy even after work hours, with lots of restaurants and bars to enjoy nearby. This home is located near many of Boston's most iconic sites. In 10 minutes, you can be in the historic North End neighborhood which offers over one hundred restaurants, cafes and shops. The trendy Seaport neighborhood is located just across the bridge to the south. Downtown Crossing, even closer, has been totally revitalized with new luxury r
notes: Please provide the names of all guests when booking to ensure they have permission to enter the unit. All guests are required to check in with the concierge upon entering the building.
transit: Broadluxe Lofts are located steps from the Greenway, offering residents easy access to everything Boston has to offer. There's no need to have a car to get around. If you have a car, parking is plentiful with a parking garage one block west of the building at One Post Office Square ($10 all day weekend parking) and 10 other garages within a quarter-mile radius. There is a cab stand in front of the Hilton hotel next door. The closest MBTA subway station is Aquarium (Blue line), just a 3-minute walk away. Being in the heart of downtown Boston, all other subway lines are less than a 10-minute walk away as well:  Orange line (State Street, 6 minutes or Downtown Crossing, 9 minutes), Green Line (Government Center, 9 minutes), Red line (Park Street or South Station, 9 minutes). Transit Score is 100! If you’d like to rent a bike, there are three Hubway stations in close proximity to the Broadluxe Lofts as well. Bike Score is 82. Logan International Airport is only a 5-minute trip on the MBTA
access: Enter the building's lobby, check in with the concierge, hop in the elevator, and you'll have full access to the second floor loft unit.
interaction: Every booking is instantly confirmed. Every call or message is answered within minutes. If you’ve never visited Boston, let me know and I’ll make sure you make the most of your time in the city. Your personal concierge is available 24/7 via phone, email or Messenger if you need anything. Otherwise, we'll leave you alone to enjoy your stay.
house_rules: No smoking ($300 fine). The only guests allowed in the loft are those guests who have been disclosed to the host (maximum of 4, 2 adults, 2 children). All guests must check in with the Concierge and show ID before entering the building. Please enjoy, but respect the neighbors in the building.
host_about: I am passionate about real estate and travel and will ensure you have an exceptional stay in Boston, where I live. I started a company, Second Home, with a mission to make turn-key second homes available in the best locations so you can enjoy more quality time with your family and friends. When traveling, I prefer to stay in an Airbnb over a hotel so I can live like a local and experience more of what each exciting destination has to offer.

name: Modern Downtown Condo w/ Gym, Great Location
summary: This Apartment is conveniently located between Boston’s Financial District & Theater District and is within walking distance from all historic landmarks, shops, and dining venues in Downtown Crossing.
space: This luxury community offers all the amenities you could wish for in a high-rise with stunning skyline views. Walnut hardwood flooring, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, high ceilings and spacious walk-in closets are some of the luxurious features you will find in this apartment. The apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including towels. The building has a common area, a Business Center, an Indoor Pool and  a Gym but it is a very quiet one where your neighbors respect your privacy. The place is set up to make the guest(s) feel comfortable and at home.  The TV is fully functional with access to Cable, Hulu, Netflix, HBO GO and even the PS4.

Located at a 5 minutes walking distance from downtown crossing and for the party people, it is located within a block from all the nightclubs. The movie theaters is on the next block and Newbury street along with the Prudential mall is 4 blocks away. At last but not least, it is 3 train stop away from the TD garden where you can watch The Celtics or the other notable events that occur there
notes: Property amenities include: •24 hour concierge and doorman • State-of-the-art fitness center • Cardio Theater • Indoor heated infinity swimming pool • Individual washer/dryer in the apartment  • Internet lounge • Gaming lounge • Clubhouse • Activity center • Business center •Train and bus stop directly outside •Within walking distance of Walgreens, Dunkin Donuts, and many Supermarkets •Parking garage with affordable daily rates
transit: There is an Orange Line Station right below the below the building. Green Line station (Boylston) is 3 min away. Being at the center of the city, most things are in walking distance.
access: You have access to the apartment, and all the fantastic amenities this building offers to its tenants.
interaction: This is a self checking place. The apartment door will always be unlocked before checking in and and should always be left unlocked when checking out. You will find the keys on the dining’s room table and they should be left there when checking out.

name: Great location to everything and to subway
summary: Best location and a fantastic view of historical Boston Common!! This cozy apartment is located in the heart of Boston with walking distance to major subway line (Green/Red/Orange) and main attractions in the city.
space: Cozy one bedroom, one bathroom apartment located in downtown Boston with a beautiful view of Boston Common. It's an ideal location for those visiting Boston for either work or travel.  Walking distance to the major subway lines connecting to public transportation (Red & Green line: Park Street, Orange line: Downtown Crossing).   Queen size bed in the bedroom and an extra sleeping on the comfy queen size sofa bed in the living room. Fully equipped kitchen and 4 dinning seats in the dinning area. It's also equipped with an iron, ironing board, hair dryer, wifi, a 49in TV with cable. For longer stay, coin operated laundry units are available on the same floor ($1.75/load, payable by quarters).  Walking distance to restaurants, bars, grocery stores, Starbucks, Dunkin' Donuts and Chinatown.

house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I
host_about: Sonder is reimagining the way people travel. Now in 20+ cities, we’ve been featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and named 2019’s most innovative hospitality brand by Fast Company. We’ve taken the best parts of home and hotel and combined them into an entirely new experience. All of our spaces are uniquely designed, have 24/7 guest support, and contain all the essentials you need for an impeccable stay. No matter what you’re looking for, there’s a Sonder for you.

name: Bold 2BR in Downtown Crossing by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the bright and inviting living area with beautiful high ceilings, spacious bedrooms with comfortable Full-size beds, and modern fully-equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Located in Downtown Crossing, you're in the center of Boston's wonderful shopping district, and close to an array of restaurants, bars, and entertainment.
space: NA
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the bright and inviting living area with beautiful high ceilings, spacious bedrooms with comfortable Full-size beds, and modern fully-equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances. Located in Downtown Crossing, you're in the center of Boston's wonderful shopping district, and close to an array of restaurants, bars, and entertainment. Downtown Crossing combines a bustling shopping center with beautiful parks and monuments. This historic city center charms visitors with live performances, unique restaurants, and street vendors. Enjoy local cuisine at Silvertone, take a relaxing stroll through Boston Commons, or catch a show at the stunning Boston Opera House. There's limited parking in the area, but there's plenty to discover within walking distance - check out your Neighborhood Guide for suggestions. Your Sonder's keys will be found in a lockbox and we'll be sending you detailed access information three days before your stay. If you need any help, just giv
neighborhood_overview: Downtown Crossing combines a bustling shopping center with beautiful parks and monuments. This historic city center charms visitors with live performances, unique restaurants, and street vendors. Enjoy local cuisine at Silvertone, take a relaxing stroll through Boston Commons, or catch a show at the stunning Boston Opera House.
notes: There's limited parking in the area, but there's plenty to discover within walking distance - check out your Neighborhood Guide for suggestions. Your Sonder's keys will be found in a lockbox and we'll be sending you detailed access information three days before your stay. If you need any help, just give us a call. Due to the central location of your Sonder, you may experience some city noise. Noise machines or ear plugs are available upon request. This Sonder doesn't have laundry facilities. However, Myrtle St. Laundromat is a well-reviewed laundromat within walking distance.

name: Breathe-taking 1-BR in Boston + Designer Finishes!
summary: Conveniently located between Boston’s Financial District and Theater District, this apt is within walking distance from all historic landmarks, shops, and dining in downtown crossing. Superior amenities like a 25-yard indoor pool, plush clubhouse, & internet lounge along with concierge services distinguish this upscale high rise. Over-sized windows overlooking Boston’s skyline, hardwood floor, chef-caliber kitchen with stainless steel appliances are some of the features of this apt home.
space: 1 BED 1 BATH SLEEPS 3 Located next to Boston’s Financial District, Theatre District and Downtown Crossing these apartments put you at the center of all the action to enjoy the city like a real Bostonian. Whether you’re in town for sightseeing, business or shopping there’s no better way to get around Boston than from these apartments. Take a short 10 min walk to Downtown Crossing and Faneuil Hall or take the subway to explore Boston - the Orange and Green T-stops are just across the street. This luxury community offers all the amenities you could wish for in a high-rise with stunning skyline views. Dive into the 25-yard infinity pool, take a rejuvenating back rub in the massage room or get the last minute presentation done in the modern business center or relax at the lounge with multiple flat screen TVs and private kitchen. The first-class amenities translate to the finest finishes in your apartment: hardwood flooring, 9 foot ceilings, and gourmet kitchens with granite countertops and

neighborhood_overview: Major attractions •Restaurants – The Q Restaurant (1 min), Artisan Bistro (.1 mi), My Thai Vegan Café (1 min), Sip Wine Bar and Kitchen (.1 mi) •Faneuil Hall for shopping and dining – .8 mi •Shops at Prudential Center – 2 mi •Downtown Crossing  featuring local events, eclectic nightlife, history and culture – Freedom Trail, over 100 restaurants, and over 500 retailers – .4 mi •Massachusetts Convention Center – 1.1 mi •Copely Square - .8 mi •Boston Opera House - .5 mi •New England Aquarium – 1.2 mi •Near Tufts University (6.9 mi), Tufts Medical Center (1.1 mi), and Emerson College (.2 mi)
notes: Unit Amenities: •Hardwood floors •Balcony in select units •Carpet floor in bedrooms •High ceilings •Fully-equipped kitchens •Granite countertops •Dishwasher •Stainless steel appliances •Washer and dryer •Central heat and air conditioning •Digital cable •Local phone service •Wireless internet Building Amenities: •Covered parking not included •Pet-friendly •Heated indoor pool •Full-time concierge •24hr doorman •Fitness center •Business center •Meeting room •Storage ($85-$125) •Clubhouse •Activity center •ATM •Cardio theatre •Internet lounge •Dry cleaning valet service •Gaming lounge •Wi-Fi in common areas •Internet café •On-site restaurant •Package service •Massage room
transit: This property is conveniently located 15 minutes from General Edward Lawrence Logan International Airport. Boston is America’s Walking City so public transportation is also easily accessible – just steps from the Orange and Green T-Stops and the South Station Terminal.

Prior to confirming your reservation, please reach out to the property to check their pet policies. -	To arrange parking, guest must contact us 48 hours before arrival.
host_about:
You’ve just found the best of both worlds. Bluebird Suites provides deluxe apartments with fast, free Wi-Fi, a full kitchen, living room and dining area located in 5-star buildings in the heart of the city. No matter how long you plan to stay we want you to have an amazing experience and leave with a smile.  
Looking Forward to hosting you!!

Yos and the Bluebird Suites team

house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I

name: Downtown Xing Studio|Full Kitchen|#507
summary: This spacious efficiency suite is a great option for people looking to be in the middle of the City at a price that won't break the budget! This unit was recently re-furnished and can accommodate up to 4 people via the queen bed and full-size sleeper sofa. There is a full kitchen for those who want to prepare their own meals. The location is ideal for getting around Boston without a car as most neighborhoods are accesible on foot and there are a number of T stations within a few minutes walk.
space: This studio is on the 5th floor of the building,  accessible by elevator or stairs. The spacious living area is furnished with a queen-size bed and full size sleep sofa to comfortably sleep up to 4 guests. The flooring is carpeted throughout with ceramic tile in the bathroom. This unit has central heating and cooling that is controlled via a shared thermostat in the hallway. Connect to the HD Smart TV to stream the programming of your choice or watch local channels available over the antenna. All units are equipped with wireless internet, iron and ironing board, hair dryer, coffee maker, toaster, microwave, linens and towels, and we provide a digital guest book with instructions and recommendations for the area. This is the perfect location for business travelers, couples or families who want to stay in Downtown Boston without breaking the budget.

neighborhood_overview: The central nature of this property makes it ideal for traveling or relocating professionals, students and faculty at local universities, or short term and extended stay guests looking for the perfect starting point from which to explore the City of Boston.
notes: The closest parking garages are the Boston Common Garage located at 0 Charles Street, and the Summer Street Garage located at 22 Kingston Street (This is the entrance). Daily rates range from $32-$42, with monthly rates starting $150 (with restricted weekday access)
transit: The Boston Common Park and Public Garden are only a few hundred feet away and Fenway Park is a quick 15 minutes away by train. Public transit by way of the Red, Orange and Green Subway lines is only a minute walk from the property. Grocery, dining and shopping are all within a few minute walk of the property. You can pick up the Freedom Trail very near the Boston Common. MGH, Tufts Medical, Boston University, Emerson College and many other hospitals and schools are within 5-30 minute walk or a short ride on public transit.
access: This unit is accessed by riding the elevator to the 5th floor. There is a coin-operated common laundry room located on the 5th floor of the building that is available for guest use.
interaction: We have prepared for your stay in a way that requires little to no interaction with us, unless of course you have an emergency, maintenance or management request in which case you will be provided contact information.

host_about: Husband, father, friend and real estate enthusiast. Long time Airbnb host and traveller. Small business owner and operator. Interests include food and drink, sports and nutrition, golf, anything Italy, joking around and having fun and anything that fits in to those categories!

summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the sleek hardwood floors, exposed brick, and fully-equipped kitchen. This apartment is located in Downtown Crossing, known for quality shopping, and close to Park T station.
space: NA
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the sleek hardwood floors, exposed brick, and fully-equipped kitchen. This apartment is located in Downtown Crossing, known for quality shopping, and close to Park T station. Downtown Crossing combines a bustling shopping center with beautiful parks and monuments. This historic city center charms visitors with live performances, unique restaurants, and street vendors. Enjoy local cuisine at Silvertone, take a relaxing stroll through Boston Commons, or catch a show at the stunning Boston Opera House. Please note, this building is located next door to the Orpheum Theatre so you may encounter some noise and crowds. In the case of the front entrance being blocked for a larger show, there is an alternative entrance around the corner on Winter Street.

summary: Perfectly located amid the Boston skyline is our fully furnished apartment. Near the Financial and Theater Districts, you are steps from the New England Aquarium, the Freedom Trail, Downtown Crossing, and Faneuil Hall.
space: This 28 story luxury high-rise building is equipped with unparalleled amenities including the club suite with a large screen TV and group seating, the indoor heated infinity swimming pool, the state-of-the-art fitness center and the Click! Cafe Internet lounge. Walnut hardwood flooring, stainless steel appliances, in-unit washer/dryer, high ceilings and spacious walk-in closets are some of the luxurious features residents will find in their apartment homes. Your fully appointed apartment is furnished with all the necessities of home, including linens and towels. neighborhood_overview: This elegant building is perfectly situated in the heart of Boston, right in Chinatown, between the Theater District and the Financial District with several attractions nearby including Boston Faneuil Hall, Freedom Trail, Downtown Crossing and New England Aquarium.
notes: Although we do not allow pets in our apartment, this apartment is located at a residential property that allows pets and there may be pet owners in the building.
transit: Our fantastic location is just steps from the Orange and Green T-stops, minutes from South Station and close to I-90, with great shopping and dining nearby.
access: You have access to the entire apartment, and all the fantastic amenities this building offers to its tenants.
interaction: We have local staff that you might meet in person that meticulously prepares the apartments for your arrival. Your check-in is typically handled by the building's front desk staff. We provide all other customer service and are available via phone and email promptly.  24 hour support is available for any emergencies that may occur.
house_rules: NA
host_location: New York, New York, United States
host_about:
We have been providing vacation rental apartments for over 10 years across the East Coast. We are known for our distinctively furnished apartments in popular locations, and for our attentive service. You’ll find that our rates are quite reasonable. If you're looking for a safe, comfortable place with fabulous amenities and Wi-Fi (we know you need the Wi-Fi!) in the Boston MA area, Washington DC, Miami FL or very close to NYC in Jersey City or Hoboken, we'd love to host you. Many of the buildings where our apartments are located feature amenities such as beautiful lobbies, 24 hour front desk staff, fitness centers, business centers, recreation rooms, indoor or outdoor pools and whirlpools. If you are traveling with children, some buildings offer playgrounds (many buildings are near public playgrounds as well) or indoor playrooms. Depending on the location, you can stay for just a few days, a week, a month or more. 

We offer an assortment of short-term apartments in sizes ranging from a studio to three bedrooms that are fully furnished with all the comforts of home. Our local staff meticulously prepares your apartment before your arrival, and we offer 24 hour assistance for any emergencies after business hours. When you arrive at your apartment, the beds will be made, towels and bath amenities will be stocked in the bathrooms, and the coffee maker will be set up in the kitchen with some sample coffees, sweetener and creamer (teabags too if that is your preference) to start your morning off properly. If you’d like to cook a meal, the kitchen is stocked with dishes, cutlery, glassware and pots and pans. The living room is set up with a TV and cable channels, and the Wi-Fi router password and instructions will be prominently displayed so you can get connected quickly. You can also make local and toll-free phone calls at no charge. 

Please contact us to confirm the exact availability of the apartment you are interested in. We’d love to host you (and your family) for your vacation or business trip.

name: Spacious 1BR in Financial District by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the sophisticated, open-concept living area with beautiful expansive windows, spacious bedroom with a comfortable Full-size bed, and sleek fully-equipped kitchen with modern appliances. Located in the Financial District, you're steps away from the waterfront, and close to an array of wonderful restaurants, bars, and shops.
space: NA
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the sophisticated, open-concept living area with beautiful expansive windows, spacious bedroom with a comfortable Full-size bed, and sleek fully-equipped kitchen with modern appliances. Located in the Financial District, you're steps away from the waterfront, and close to an array of wonderful restaurants, bars, and shops. Although mostly frequented by professionals, Boston’s Financial District offers beautiful historic sites and delicious restaurants for anyone to enjoy. Experience American history up close and personal and head out to the Freedom Trail, a 2.5 mile, self-guided tour that leads you through iconic landmarks that represent some of the nation’s more formative years. One of the stops along this tour leads you to Faneuil Hall, where America’s original pushcart shopping began. Offering more than just hand-crafted souvenirs, this marketplace hosts world-class street performers and eclectic boutiques. Once you’ve worked up enough an appetite, you mu
neighborhood_overview: Although mostly frequented by professionals, Boston’s Financial District offers beautiful historic sites and delicious restaurants for anyone to enjoy. Experience American history up close and personal and head out to the Freedom Trail, a 2.5 mile, self-guided tour that leads you through iconic landmarks that represent some of the nation’s more formative years. One of the stops along this tour leads you to Faneuil Hall, where America’s original pushcart shopping began. Offering more than just hand-crafted souvenirs, this marketplace hosts world-class street performers and eclectic boutiques. Once you’ve worked up enough an appetite, you must indulge at Cafe Fleuri’s one-of-a-kind Chocolate Bar buffet; the cuisine is American, but the experience is out of this world.
notes: Your Sonder's keys will be found in a lockbox and we'll be sending you detailed access information three days before your stay. If you need any help, just give us a call. There's limited parking in the area, but there's plenty to discover within walking distance - check out your Neighborhood Guide for suggestions.

name: 2. Theatre, Tufts, Downtown-Location! 5 guests
summary: Your sunny, spacious, newly renovated two bedroom apartment has hardwood floors, European style kitchen and a large bathroom with full tub and shower. Location is ideal for exploring Boston! Easy walk to Tufts, Chinatown, Financial District, Leather District, South Station.  If your dates are not available please reach out to us. We may be able to suggest another property. Ask us about parking options.
space: This cozy and pristine 700SF +/- apartment has two bedrooms; one large bedroom with a queen size bed and new memory foam mattress, a walk in closet, and another closet with a washer and dryer for your use. The second bedroom is smaller, has a double/full bed and also a new memory foam mattress. Hooks and shelves on the wall serve as the closet.  The full tiled bathroom has a full tub and shower, large sink cabinet and new toilet.  The living/dining area has an efficiency kitchen with all appliances and cookware for preparing simple meals; or just a cup of coffee! Microwave, refrigerator, dishwasher, oven and stove, all in stainless steel. All plates, coffee cups, glasses, utensils and cookware are provided. Coffee and tea, sugar and coffeemate, salt and pepper will be in the cabinet for you. Restaurants, cafes and shops abound in this vibrant downtown neighborhood. Short walk to Boston Common and Public Garden.

neighborhood_overview: The apartment is in downtown Boston, nestled in Chinatown and bordering the Boston Common, Downtown Crossing, the Theatre District, Bay Village, and the South End. Walk to Tufts Medical Center. Restaurant central! Many Chinese, Vietnamese and Japanese restaurants in the neighborhood - ask us for our favorites! All other types of cuisine also within easy walking distance.
notes: Check in is at 3PM and check out is by 11AM. Please alert us of your planned arrival and departure time at least 24 hours ahead of time. We cannot offer early/late check ins or space to store your bags. Please ask about storage solutions in Boston!  Smoking of any kind is forbidden in the apartment, the common areas, on the front steps of the building or within 50 feet of the building entrance. Smokers can go to the small park at the end of the block. Air Conditioning; this apartment does not have central A/C. There is a window unit in the summertime.
transit: Easy subway access at South Station, Tufts or Chinatown stops. Trains and buses to NYC and New England destinations leave from South Station.  Uber/Lyft/Taxi widely available. Having said all of that, you'll easily be able to walk to most places you want to go!
access: You'll have full use of the entire apartment during your stay. Nobody will be there except you. You can walk or use public transportation to most sites. Uber/Taxi also easy. Please ask us about parking options.
interaction: If our paths cross, terrific. We are available 24/7 for anything you need.
house_rules: -No smoking -Smoking is strictly prohibited both inside and within 50ft of the outside of the building.  -Please remove shoes while in the apartment.  -Please respect us and our neighbors by not having any additional guests.  -No parties, quiet hours begin at 9pm. -No pets. -No packages may be sent to the house. -Leave the apartment as you found it.
host_about: Family, hospitality, travel, and food are what is most important to us. We look forward to hosting you in one of our meticulously furnished and well appointed five star apartments. Happy to recommend restaurants, activities and other things to do while staying with us.

When booking, please tell us about yourself and what brings you to Boston. We ask that you have finished the Airbnb verification process by verifying one social media account and scanning your offline ID. Go to www.airbnb.com/verify for more info. We cannot offer space to store your bags past 11AM on your check out day or earlier than 4PM on your arrival day. We recommend using the app called StoreMe which has luggage storage all over town. Use the promo code "bnbbos" to get $3 off the first hour of your reservation. There may not be a storage solution near the property but you should be able to find them near most T stops or perhaps by your first destination! A quick note about taxes. name: Spacious Studio Apartment at Downtown Boston
summary: Spacious private 1 bedroom studio with separated kitchen and bathroom right in Downtown Boston.  Conveniently located just 1-minute walk to the T,  Boston Common and historical tourist spots.
space: Spacious 1-bedroom studio situated very close to Boston Common – located in the downtown district. Chinatown is right behind if you want to try authentic Chinese cuisine. The home has reception, kitchen, bathroom and studio bedroom with natural lighting. Laundry is available on the floor, if you need just let me know. Utilities and wifi included. The location is super convenient: there are amazing nightclubs theaters restaurants and countless cafes with walking distance.

summary: Luxury and Central both perfectly define these upscale apartments in this newly renovated building. Widely known as a shopping zone, Downtown Crossing lies at the intersection of Washington, Winter and Summer streets. Its historic buildings now house a mix of department stores, fashion and discount chains, souvenir shops and other specialty retailers. Street vendors selling food and kn
neighborhood_overview: Widely known as a shopping zone, Downtown Crossing lies at the intersection of Washington, Winter and Summer streets. Its historic buildings now house a mix of department stores, fashion and discount chains, souvenir shops and other specialty retailers. Street vendors selling food and knick-knacks and commuters from 2 subway stations add to the daytime hustle. Office workers frequent casual lunch spots and bars.
notes: Each apartment is individually furnished and features a fully-equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances.  Spacious layouts and high ceilings provide a homey yet luxurious feel.
transit: Nearby buses include South Station Buses – 11, SL1, SL2. Other popular venues are within walking distance.

summary: This amazing 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom is tastefully equipped for at home enjoyment, with kitchen stocked with appliances, dishes, utensils. HD television with installed netflix & Hulu. The leather Couch easily folds down into a full bed and the Chaise lounge fold into a twin if needed.  Once guests is confirmed and paid, I will meet with keys and answer any questions you may have about the neighborhood etc. We will also meet for return of the keys, I am available at your call throughout the day.
space: This is an ideal situation for all kinds of travelers visiting Boston.  Its nestled right in the heart of Dwntwn Boston amidst all the action.  Steps away from the Boston Commons, Downtown Crossing Shops, and a short walk to the famous Back Bay and Newburry St. shopping, restaurants and much more! Another spectacular reason for staying in this beautiful unit is the night life; The Theatre District, and Bostons Night Club scene is just a block away as well for many enjoyable nights!

name: Cozy apartment in the heart of city!
summary: Enjoy your stay in this cozy, newly decorated apartment perfectly located in the heart of the city. This place will provide you with the best experience of exploring Boston as the locals. This is a great choice for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families.
space: We work hard to provide five-star hotel amenities which feature high-speed WiFi, smart TV, coffee machine,  tea,  sweets, and cookware.  Our apartment comfortably accommodates with one queen bed and the sofa bed folds out into a bed as well for extra sleeping space. An air mattress may also be provided upon special request. Linens, towels, and bathroom amenities will be provided. Laundry is in the basement if needed and elevator in the building.  We are here to provide you with the comfort of a home and confidence of a hotel. Very safe and secure entrance to the building. You will want to come here again and again.

name: Sleek 2BR in Financial District by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the chic, open-concept living area with modern decor, spacious bedrooms with comfortable Full-size beds, and beautiful fully-equipped kitchen with updated appliances. Located in the Financial District, you're steps away from the waterfront, and close to an array of wonderful restaurants, bars, and shops.
space: NA
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the chic, open-concept living area with modern decor, spacious bedrooms with comfortable Full-size beds, and beautiful fully-equipped kitchen with updated appliances. Located in the Financial District, you're steps away from the waterfront, and close to an array of wonderful restaurants, bars, and shops. Although mostly frequented by professionals, Boston’s Financial District offers beautiful historic sites and delicious restaurants for anyone to enjoy. Experience American history up close and personal and head out to the Freedom Trail, a 2.5 mile, self-guided tour that leads you through iconic landmarks that represent some of the nation’s more formative years. One of the stops along this tour leads you to Faneuil Hall, where America’s original pushcart shopping began. Offering more than just hand-crafted souvenirs, this marketplace hosts world-class street performers and eclectic boutiques. Once you’ve worked up enough an appetite, you must indulge at Cafe
neighborhood_overview: Although mostly frequented by professionals, Boston’s Financial District offers beautiful historic sites and delicious restaurants for anyone to enjoy. Experience American history up close and personal and head out to the Freedom Trail, a 2.5 mile, self-guided tour that leads you through iconic landmarks that represent some of the nation’s more formative years. One of the stops along this tour leads you to Faneuil Hall, where America’s original pushcart shopping began. Offering more than just hand-crafted souvenirs, this marketplace hosts world-class street performers and eclectic boutiques. Once you’ve worked up enough an appetite, you must indulge at Cafe Fleuri’s one-of-a-kind Chocolate Bar buffet; the cuisine is American, but the experience is out of this world.
notes: There's limited parking in the area, but there's plenty to discover within walking distance - check out your Neighborhood Guide for suggestions. Your Sonder's keys will be found in a lockbox and we'll be sending you detailed access information three days before your stay. If you need any help, just give us a call.

name: Unmatched Boston Harbor Views in 1BR Luxury Suite
summary: Treat your family to an unforgettable vacation here in your spacious, modern luxury 1 Bedroom Suite that boasts unmatched views of the Boston harbor, and an array of top-rated amenities. Your entire family will be comfortable in our well-appointed suite, which include free Wi-Fi, a full kitchenette, separate living and sleeping areas and flat-screen TVs with DVD players and video games.
space: Housed in a skyscraper overlooking Boston Harbor, this sophisticated suite is a 4-minute walk from Faneuil Hall and a 5-minute walk from the New England Aquarium and State Street subway station. Free WiFi, desks and flat-screen TVs with premium channels are offered in the airy 1-bedroom suite, along with kitchenette. Separate living spaces feature dining tables and pull-out sofas. There’s a lounge/bar and an open-air observation deck with city views. Other amenities include an exercise room and a business center. Continental breakfast is available for a fee.

access: Stay healthy with a visit to our gym, offering cutting-edge cardiovascular and weight equipment. Or admire the view from our 26th-floor open-air Observation Deck. We also offer activities for children, including an on-site movie theater. Enjoy some of Boston’s most historic sites and attractions, located just minutes from our property - including Quincy Market, Faneuil Hall and the Boston Opera House. Take in a game at Fenway Park, or visit the New England Aquarium.

name: ★SPECTACULAR★ 1Bed/1Bath in Downtown Boston!!!
summary: Hello there! Want to be in the right place to explore Boston? Look no further, you found it! This is a SPECTACULAR one bedroom apartment, with enough space for you and your family and/or friends. All the essential will be provide such as sheets, towels, kitchen and bathroom basics.  Be part of the sightseeing and live like a local; a few steps from the building you can find restaurants, the Boston Common Park, The Public Garden and more!!!  Looking forward to being your host!!! Mariana
space: This is a beautiful and recently renovated one bedroom apartment, located right in downtown. The building has an authentic Boston style, really charming, you will love it. The apartment is on the 4th floor and you can get there using the elevator, so no worries at all!!! What do I offer you? - WiFi. - Full equipped kitchen. - FREE coffee and tea. - Central heat and A/C What´s nearby? - 1 min walk from Boston common park. - 2 min walk from Public Garden. - 5 min walk from Newbury st. - Easy access to public transportation. If this is your first time in Boston or no, I´ll be more than happy to help you with whatever you need and make the best of your experience. Please note that we DON´T have parking; sorry about that.

neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is AWESOME!!! You are right in downtown and it´s totally safe!!! You can relax and take a walk at the Boston Common park or Public Garden; you can try any of the amazing restaurants nearby and stores within walking distance. You are going to have a great time!!!
notes: The Building is the one that has the Shaking Crab restaurant sign.
transit: - You will have the train about 5 min walking (public transportation). - You can use Boston Common garage, but please note that is a little bit expensive.
access: You will have access to the entire apartment.
interaction: Sometimes I like to stop by and say hi =)
house_rules: - Keep it down after 9 pm
host_about:
Hello there... My name is Mariana and I´m from Caracas, Venezuela. 
I am a publicist and I just love people interaction and get to know other cultures.
I am living in Boston, Massachusetts and I´ll be more than happy to host you!

name: Charming Corner Unit, Park View, Subway close by
summary: Beautiful one bedroom corner unit in the heart of downtown Boston. Best location and a fantastic view of historical Boston Common!! This cozy apartment is located in the heart of Boston with tons to do and a walk score of 99. Subway station is just right in front and close to many historic landmarks such as Boston Common, Public Garden, Freedom Trail, State House, Charles River. My place is good for people looking for convenience.
space: Entire apartment accommodates up to 4 people. Bright corner unit with beautiful Boston Common park view in the bedroom. It's an ideal location for those visiting Boston for either work or travel.  Walking distance to the major subway lines connecting to public transportation (Red & Green line: Park Street, Orange line: Downtown Crossing).   Queen size bed with firm mattress in the bedroom and an extra sleeping on the comfy queen size sofa bed in the living room. Fully equipped kitchen with basic cookware. It's also equipped with an iron, ironing board, hair dryer, wifi, a TV with cable. For longer stay, coin operated laundry units are available on the same floor ($1.75/load, payable by quarters).  Walking distance to restaurants, bars, grocery stores, Starbucks, Dunkin' Donuts and Chinatown.

notes: I only host families, business travelers, couples, and solo travelers. Please, no more than 2 unrelated people.
transit: Parking: Due to it's convenience location, it's really no need to drive your car. But if you do, there are some garage parking nearby ranging in between $30-$50 per day.
interaction: Guests will have privacy throughout their entire stay. I will be available for questions via airbnb chat, email, text and phone.
house_rules: - No shoes in the apartment please.  - Kids are welcome but the apartment is not 'child-proofed' - Absolute no smoking in the unit. If find out smoking inside, will ask you to check out immediately. - Self check-in and check-out. - We may charge up to $100 if you don't return or lost keys.

name: Boston Charm - Downtown Crossing - 2 Bed, 1 Bath
summary: Apartment is truly located in the heart of Boston, at 51 Temple Pl. Entire apartment featuring 2 private bedrooms (Queen Beds), full kitchen with all the essentials, newly-renovated custom bathroom, sizable Living/Common Area, and small patio. Queen-sized air mattress may be provided upon request to accommodate additional guests.
space: Located in the bustling "Downtown Crossing" district of Boston, this apartment is truly in a prime location. Public transit is just steps away. Restaurants, retail stores, pharmacy's, coffee shops, supermarkets and quick shops line the streets.  The unit itself features new hardwood floors, exposed brick, high ceilings, and a custom bathroom which was recently renovated.  One bedroom has 2 windows, the other bedroom is smaller, with no windows (Queen Beds). Both have closets, and there is plenty of privacy between the two. Oh and 3 month old mattresses. Linens we provide are divine. The common area is comfortable and newly furnished with a large sectional sofa, coffee table, console, and wall-mounted flat-screen TV.   The kitchen is fully-equipped, and well-stocked with all the essentials (toaster, coffee maker, flatware, bakeware, plates, cups, etc..) The apartment is located on the 3rd floor, in a mixed use building. I own the restaurant located on the 1st floor (we encourage guests
description: Apartment is truly located in the heart of Boston, at 51 Temple Pl. Entire apartment featuring 2 private bedrooms (Queen Beds), full kitchen with all the essentials, newly-renovated custom bathroom, sizable Living/Common Area, and small patio. Queen-sized air mattress may be provided upon request to accommodate additional guests. Located in the bustling "Downtown Crossing" district of Boston, this apartment is truly in a prime location. The unit itself features new hardwood floors, exposed brick, high ceilings, and a custom bathroom which was recently renovated.  One bedroom has 2 windows, the other bedroom is smaller, with no windows (Queen Beds). Both have closets, and there is plenty of privacy between the two. Oh and 3 month old mattresses. neighborhood_overview: NA
notes: Because it is a mixed use building, my lease tenants have made this their home. They are of course respectful, but will occasionally entertain friends in their unit. I have made it a common rule that no party's are allowed except on weekends, and on a rare special occasion.
transit: Public transit is just steps away. Taxi's, Uber, Lyft, etc are all very accessible.  There is no on-site parking, however there are many parking garages in the area. These garages offer overnight as well as multi-day parking.  Parkwhiz, Spothero and ParkingPanda are some apps I recommend for finding best parking solutions.
interaction: I may be reached at any time. I prefer any issues/concerns are brought to my attention asap so it may be resolved quickly.
house_rules: - We do not allow house party's. Small gatherings are okay on weekend nights only (Friday & Saturday).

summary: ***Available FULL WEEK Octob (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) WOULD PREFER TO RENT FULL WEEK BUT WILL CONSIDER STAY OF SHORTER LENGTH*** $250/NIGHT  - ONLY $188/NIGHT FOR 7 NIGHT STAY!!! space: The Marriott Custom House 1-bedroom villa/suite boasts unmatched views of the harbor, with modern luxury and an array of top-rated amenities. You and your family will be comfortable in this one-bedroom suite, which includes free Wi-Fi, a full kitchenette, separate living and sleeping areas (pullout bed in living room) and flat-screen TVs with DVD players and video games. Stay healthy with a visit to the gym, offering cutting-edge cardiovascular and weight equipment. Or admire the view from the 26th-floor open-air Observation Deck. This location also offers activities for children, including an on-site movie theater. Enjoy some of Boston’s most historic sites and attractions, located just minutes from the property - including Quincy Market, Faneuil Hall and the Boston Opera House. Take in a game at Fenway Park, or visit the New England Aquarium.

name: Naturally Lit, Modern Loft in Heart of Downtown!
summary: Our loft, in the heart of downtown Boston, is large, open-plan and flooded with natural light. Recently updated, it is airy and modern with polished concrete floors, custom-tiled bath, a modern kitchen, European designer touches and very fast WiFi.
space: The separate master bedroom has a comfortable, bed, with a super comfy new mattress, high-end linens, plenty of windows and a walk-in closet.  The custom tiled bathroom features European Boffi fixtures, a large walk-in shower with glass walls and great water pressure. Enjoy the bright and clean, fully-equipped kitchen with European Gaggenau cook-top and convection oven in a large island. The dining table seats four comfortably  - more if you squish - but realistically you'll likely be out in the neighborhood restaurants! There is a full-size, comfortable sofa-bed in the main living area - good for two more guests.   We have a large smart TV with Roku built in (HBO, Showtime, Amazon Prime Movies, Netflix etc.).  High-speed WiFi throughout the apartment with the fastest available connection. We supply, high-end toiletries, towels and high thread-count linens. There is a hairdryer, an iron and ironing board, umbrellas, and a first aid kit. Most of all, when you are visiting our favorite c
description: Our loft, in the heart of downtown Boston, is large, open-plan and flooded with natural light. Recently updated, it is airy and modern with polished concrete floors, custom-tiled bath, a modern kitchen, European designer touches and very fast WiFi. The separate master bedroom has a comfortable, bed, with a super comfy new mattress, high-end linens, plenty of windows and a walk-in closet.  The custom tiled bathroom features European Boffi fixtures, a large walk-in shower with glass walls and great water pressure. Enjoy the bright and clean, fully-equipped kitchen with European Gaggenau cook-top and convection oven in a large island. High-speed WiFi throughout the
neighborhood_overview: We love our neighborhood!  Downtown Crossing is the heart of Boston where everyone and everything meets.  Restaurants, shopping and history are right in the neighborhood and some of the best subways in the US get you everywhere else in the Boston/Cambridge area in minutes. We have lived many years in the building and are more than happy to answer questions and make recommendations!
notes: Check-in at 3pm Check-out at 11am We can often be flexible on these times and can even store luggage if needed - just ask in advance, please!
transit: Boston's MBTA system, affectionately referred to as "The T" is mere steps from our apartment. Amtrak at South Station is a quick walk away and the "Silver Line" bus system is also within a block of us.
access: Access to the entire apartment including laundry facilities.
interaction: Whenever possible we are here in person to check you in and will likely touch base via text after the first day to make sure you are settled. Beyond that, we are available as needed or whenever you have questions but otherwise won't bother you.
house_rules: - Just the basics -   Absolutely no parties or events.  No outside guests allowed without prior permission.   No overnight guests who aren't on the original lease.   No Smoking.  No Pets.   Please respect no-noise policy in hallways. Respect our home and our neighbors.  Kids are welcome but the house isn't 'child-proofed'.
host_about: Professional middle aged couple with extensive world travel experience. We live in the heart of downtown Boston and love to get away for weekends (both long and short). We enjoy seeing films and music and checking out new restaurants and cocktail bars. No pets. Non-smokers. Very respectful of your property.

name: Private Living Room in Downtown
summary: I'm a working professional, looking to share my apartment with a traveler to Boston!  You would be staying in a spacious and cozy living room, and we would share a bathroom, and kitchen. You would definitely have privacy, especially since I am rarely home, and there is a screen that separates the living room from the rest of the apartment.  There is a lovely and friendly cat as well.
space: This is a spacious and comfortable living room in 1 BR apartment. Your space is separated by a curtain, and it’s relatively large and cozy.
description: I'm a working professional, looking to share my apartment with a traveler to Boston!  You would be staying in a spacious and cozy living room, and we would share a bathroom, and kitchen. You would definitely have privacy, especially since I am rarely home, and there is a screen that separates the living room from the rest of the apartment.  There is a lovely and friendly cat as well. This is a spacious and comfortable living room in 1 BR apartment. Your space is separated by a curtain, and it’s relatively large and cozy. Downtown crossing is home to hundreds of restaurants, right next to the theater district, in the middle of the historical Boston, and is in close proximity to nearly anything you can think of. If you can get somewhere on foot, there is subway (or the T as well call it in boston) that will being you wherever you need to go in a short period of time. You will be in a great proximity to all the Boston subways: Green, Red, Orange, and Blue lines. Very convenient to get aro
neighborhood_overview: Downtown crossing is home to hundreds of restaurants, right next to the theater district, in the middle of the historical Boston, and is in close proximity to nearly anything you can think of. If you can get somewhere on foot, there is subway (or the T as well call it in boston) that will being you wherever you need to go in a short period of time.
notes: Please, note there is a cat on premise. She is very friendly, and doesn't shed. I do use airpurifier all the time. And then cat would not bother you. Also, please note there is no WiFi at the apartment, but I can lend you my computer. Lastly, since the living room area is separated by the curtain, it provides you privacy but does not isolate any sound. I usually wake up around 8am and go to sleep around midnight, so I hope my routine doesn’t bother you (promise, I’m not loud haha)
transit: You will be in a great proximity to all the Boston subways: Green, Red, Orange, and Blue lines. Very convenient to get around by public transport, and there are plenty of Uber and Lyft drivers in the area, although from here you'll be able to walk almost anywhere!
interaction: NA
house_rules: - Please, be mindful of neighbors and remove shoes upon entry.
host_about: Eastern European in Boston! Love to travel, meet new people, and experience things.

house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I
host_about: Sonder is reimagining the way people travel. Now in 20+ cities, we’ve been featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and named 2019’s most innovative hospitality brand by Fast Company. We’ve taken the best parts of home and hotel and combined them into an entirely new experience. All of our spaces are uniquely designed, have 24/7 guest support, and contain all the essentials you need for an impeccable stay. No matter what you’re looking for, there’s a Sonder for you.

name: Boston Common Overlooking One Bed Large & Spacious
summary: My apartment is located in an incredible location - overlooking Boston Common! With three big windows you can look out to Boston Common located at the Center of Downtown Boston. The kitchen, dining room, family room is all one open space which I love. My elevator makes it easy for bringing luggage in and out, I have a huge King bed and am located right next to public transportation, the Freedom Trail, TONS of restaurants, historic sites, and everything you could possibly want.
space: My apartment feels very large and open - the three big windows look out right on top of Boylston Street.

My apartment feels very large and open - the three big windows look out right on top of Boylston Street. Access to the entire unit! Self check in. If you need any additional assistance, please contact me. The Theatre District Downtown is incredible, right next to Boston Common, it's super easy to get to Boston Common, the Public Garden, Beacon Hill, Back Bay, the North End, the Financial District. Super easy to walk on the Freedom Trail, take tours, see Historic sites, and find good restaurants. Super easy to wal
neighborhood_overview: The Theatre District Downtown is incredible, right next to Boston Common, it's super easy to get to Boston Common, the Public Garden, Beacon Hill, Back Bay, the North End, the Financial District. Super easy to walk on the Freedom Trail, take tours, see Historic sites, and find good restaurants.
notes: Emerson College is right next door, the atmosphere is full of energy and many young people around.  Also at the bottom of the building is Newton MA's famous Barking Crab, a good restaurant to eat local seafood out. Also Moulin Rougue is playing in the theatre just down the street from my building.
transit: Super easy to walk or Super easy to take an Uber or Lyft or Taxi.  There is also public transportation easily accessible just down the street from me.  Arlington Station (Green line) is just down the street, Chinatown Station (Orange line) is just down the street the opposite direction, and Park Station (Red line and Green line) is just across Boston Common.
interaction: Self check in. If you need any additional assistance, please contact me.
house_rules: -No smoking inside the unit ($250 fine if it's reported you smoked) -No partying allowed ($250 fine if it's reported you partied)
host_about:
We have fallen in love with New England - we love the history and the variety of things to do and see.

My wife and I are originally from the West so being able to drive one hour and see Plymouth Rock, or Providence, RI has totally changed us.  We love to spend weekends exploring and adventuring with our kids.  We just returned from our biggest family trip yet - Singapore, Thailand, Cambodia, South Korea, and Vietnam for 3.5 months - it was amazing.

We would love to have you stay at our place!

name: Couchsurf near south station, downtown boston.
summary: NA
space: As the listing says, this apartment is in the bustling centre of downtown Boston. The property is a 3 minutes walk from South Station and 2 minutes walk from Chinatown Station or Boylston Station. The Boston Common is fairly a couple minute walk away which also leads to the Boston Freedom Trail. The Boston Opera House would be just a minute walk from the house which is surrounded by numerous restaurants, bars and brand outlets/shops. The apartment has a very lively view of the Millenium Tower and the clock standing outside your window would add to the feeling of grandeur to the towers complementing its architecture. Adding to the amazing location, Boston’s State Street Financial Centre is the next building from the property. If you would like to visit the brilliant campuses of Harvard or MIT, you could hop on the the Red Line from South Station to see the educational landmarks 4 stops away (12 minutes). Or if you like to spend some time at the beach, you would need to get on the blue l

name: Downtown Boston, Near South Station Bus Terminal
summary: It's an cozy apartment that has 2 bedroom with one queen-sized bed and one full-sized bed. There is also an sofa-pull out for additional sleeping area.  We welcome you to the outskirts of Chinatown! Here you will find yourself an 1 minute walk into Chinatown where you can experience asian food and bakeries.  Walk another 5-10 minutes and you'll find yourself into Boston Common. There is an AMC movie theater across the park, an shopping area, and fascinating historical sites.

host_about:
Allow me to introduce myself, my name is Ping and I welcome you to our newly renovated apartment! 

If there is anything I would like to share, it would be my love for food. I especially have an fondness for coffee and tea in particular. There is nothing more relaxing and calming then to read an book while enjoying an cup of coffee. 

One of the many perks about staying at this area is that it's close to the aquarium and the harbor to enjoy some nice seafood. If you're an museum-type, I would suggest some of the many museums here. The closest one would be the Children's Museum!

name: Luxury Loft In Downtown Boston
summary: This beautifully renovated and designer decorated apartment is in the midst of the bustling city. Sun soaked, spacious and modern, it is the perfect base to explore everything the city has to offer.
space: This extremely spacious unit has massive windows, designer decor, and wonderful privacy in the midst of the city. With two bathrooms and a fully stocked kitchen you'll have room to spread out. There is also a dining table that can easily accommodate four guests. The furnishings are a nice mix of antique pieces and modern design. We're certain you'll love your stay.
description: This beautifully renovated and designer decorated apartment is in the midst of the bustling city. Sun soaked, spacious and modern, it is the perfect base to explore everything the city has to offer. This extremely spacious unit has massive windows, designer decor, and wonderful privacy in the midst of the city. With two bathrooms and a fully stocked kitchen you'll have room to spread out. There is also a dining table that can easily accommodate four guests. The furnishings are a nice mix of antique pieces and modern design. We're certain you'll love your stay. You are renting and have access to the entire apartment. Guests will have privacy throughout their entire stay. I will be available for questions via airbnb chat. This is one of the most centrally located apartments in the city. With just a short walk to all the subway lines, the Nor
neighborhood_overview: This is one of the most centrally located apartments in the city. With just a short walk to all the subway lines, the North End, Faneuil Hall, the Greenway, the Waterfront, the Aquarium, the Freedom Trail and innumerable other attractions, you will have an array of options for entertainment and adventure.
notes: NA
transit: All subway lines are within a ten minute walk. The airport is fifteen minutes away and both main rail hubs are within a fifteen minute walk. Of course, taxi, Uber, Lyft are all options as well!

name: Magnificent 1BR Boston apt + Superior Amenities!
summary: Conveniently located between Bostons Financial District and Theater District, these apartments are within walking distance from all historic landmarks, shops, and dining venues in Downtown Crossing. Superior amenities like a 25-yard indoor pool, a plush clubhouse distinguish this upscale high-rise. Oversized windows overlooking Boston skyline, hardwood floors, and chef-caliber kitchens with granite counter tops & stainless steel appliances are only a few of the features of these wonderful homes
space: 1 Bed, 1 Bath, Sleeps 3 Located right in the heart of Boston, overlooking the beautiful skyline, the builsing’s newly constructed, fully furnished, luxury apartments are beyond compare. Whether you are looking for a relaxing swim in the 25-yard indoor infinity pool or attending to business in the Internet Café, these apartments have it all. On top of the five-star amenities inside the building, walk right outside and experience true Bostonian city life. Downtown Crossing is home to the historical Freedom Trail, over 100 restaurants, 500 retailers, bars, nightclubs, and different cultural events. Planning to explore Boston or beyond? This fantastic location is just steps from the Orange and Green T-stops, South Station Terminal, I-90, and Logan International Airport. The ease that comes with our 24 hour check in and concierge service, parking garage, as well as unparalleled on-site amenities makes this the only place to stay on your next trip to Boston!

notes: Unit Amenities Include:  •Fully furnished – bedding, table linens, dinnerware, flatware, glassware, bathroom accessories and towels, basic kitchen electronics, and basic cleaning supplies •Dishwasher •Fully equipped kitchen - stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, European-style cabinetry •Floor to ceiling windows •Washer/dryer •Spacious floor plan •Walk-in closets •Individually controlled heat & air-conditioning •Cable, local phone service, and wireless internet included •Complimentary Welcome Package featuring local area information, toiletries, and everyday home necessities. Building Amenities Include: •Train and bus stop directly outside •Within walking distance of Walgreens, Dunkin Donuts, and C-Mart Supermarket •Parking garage with affordable daily and monthly rates •Heated indoor infinity pool •Club suite – flat screen TV, games, and comfortable group seating areas •Fully equipped 24 hour fitness center with Cardio Theater •Massage room •24 hour concierge and doorman •

neighborhood_overview: Major Attractions: •Restaurants – The Q Restaurant (1 min), Artisan Bistro (.1 mi), My Thai Vegan Café (1 min), Sip Wine Bar and Kitchen (.1 mi) •Faneuil Hall for shopping and dining – .8 mi •Shops at Prudential Center – 2 mi •Downtown Crossing featuring local events, eclectic nightlife, history and culture – Freedom Trail, over 100 restaurants, and over 500 retailers – .4 mi •Massachusetts Convention Center – 1.1 mi •Copely Square - .8 mi •New England Aquarium – 1.2 mi •Boston Opera House - .5 mi •Near Tufts University (6.9 mi), Tufts Medical Center (1.1 mi), and Emerson College (.2 mi)
notes: Unit Amenities Include:  •Fully furnished – bedding, table linens, dinnerware, flatware, glassware, bathroom accessories and towels, basic kitchen electronics, and basic cleaning supplies •Dishwasher •Fully equipped kitchen - stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, European-style cabinetry •Floor to ceiling windows •Washer/dryer •Spacious floor plan •Walk-in closets •Individually controlled heat & air-conditioning •Cable, local phone service, and wireless internet included •Complimentary Welcome Package featuring local area information, toiletries, and everyday home necessities. Building Amenities Include: •Train and bus stop directly outside •Within walking distance of Walgreens, Dunkin Donuts, and C-Mart Supermarket •Parking garage with affordable daily and monthly rates •Heated indoor infinity pool •Club suite – flat screen TV, games, and comfortable group seating areas •Fully equipped 24 hour fitness center with Cardio Theater •Massage room •24 hour concierge and doorman •
transit: This property is conveniently located 15 minutes from General Edward Lawrence Logan International Airport. Boston is America’s Walking City so public transportation is also easily accessible – just steps from the Orange and Green T-Stops and the South Station Terminal.
interaction: We pride ourselves in offering top of the line service to all of our guests. With our 24 hour check-in service and 24 hour customer service, you have all the control over your travel plans. Our dedicated agents are available any time to address any questions or concerns.

name: 2 bedroom unit with Stunning view, Step to subway
summary: Beautiful two bedroom unit facing Boston Common in the heart of downtown Boston. This cozy apartment is located in the heart of Boston with tons to do and a walk score of 99. Subway station is just right in front and close to many historic landmarks such as Boston Common, Public Garden, Freedom Trail, State House, Charles River. My place is good for people looking for convenience.
space: Entire apartment accommodates up to 5 people. Beautiful view of Boston Common park in one of the bedrooms. It's an ideal location for those visiting Boston for either work or travel.  Walking distance to the major subway lines connecting to public transportation (Red & Green line: Park Street, Orange line: Downtown Crossing).   Queen size beds with firm mattress in two bedrooms and an extra sleeping on the comfy full size sofa bed in the living room. Fully equipped kitchen with basic cookware. It's also equipped with an iron, ironing board, hair dryer, wifi, a TV with cable. For longer stay, coin operated laundry units are available on the same floor ($1.75/load, payable by quarters).  Walking distance to restaurants, bars, grocery stores, Starbucks, Dunkin' Donuts and Chinatown.

name: Simple 2BR in Financial District by Sonder
summary: At this Sonder, you'll love the fully-equipped kitchen, open-concept layout, and contemporary interior design. Located in the Financial District, steps away from the waterfront.
space: NA
description: At this Sonder, you'll love the fully-equipped kitchen, open-concept layout, and contemporary interior design. Located in the Financial District, steps away from the waterfront. Although mostly frequented by professionals, Boston’s Financial District offers beautiful historic sites and delicious restaurants for anyone to enjoy. Experience American history up close and personal and head out to the Freedom Trail, a 2.5 mile, self-guided tour that leads you through iconic landmarks that represent some of the nation’s more formative years. One of the stops along this tour leads you to Faneuil Hall, where America’s original pushcart shopping began. Offering more than just hand-crafted souvenirs, this marketplace hosts world-class street performers and eclectic boutiques. Once you’ve worked up enough an appetite, you must indulge at Cafe Fleuri’s one-of-a-kind Chocolate Bar buffet; the cuisine is American, but the experience is out of this world. Your Sonder's keys will be found in a lockbox

Offering more than just hand-crafted souvenirs, this marketplace hosts world-class street performers and eclectic boutiques. Once you’ve worked up enough an appetite, you must indulge at Cafe Fleuri’s one-of-a-kind Chocolate Bar buffet; the cuisine is American, but the experience is out of this world.
notes: Your Sonder's keys will be found in a lockbox and we'll be sending you detailed access information three days before your stay. If you need any help, just give us a call. There's limited parking in the area, but there's plenty to discover within walking distance - check out your Neighborhood Guide for suggestions. This Sonder does not have air conditioning. We can provide a fan, upon request, for you to use during your stay.
interaction: NA
house_rules: House Rules 1. All bookings require a security deposit of $300 or more. You will not be charged for this in advance. 2. Guests can cancel within 24 hours of booking and receive a full refund, or cancel anytime up to seven days before the start of your trip and receive a 50% refund. Trips cancelled fewer than seven days in advance are not eligible for refunds. If you cancel within 24 hours of booking, please reach out to our team, as this refund has to be processed manually.   3. Check-in time is any time after 4 pm. Check-out time is any time before 11 am. You're welcome to request an early check in or late checkout, but this is not guaranteed and we can only confirm 24 hours in advance. 4. We do not allow smoking of any kind, including but not limited to nicotine, tobacco derived products and/or cannabis derived substances; breaking this rule will incur a $300 fine. 5. Most of our locations do not allow pets. 6. Generally, parties or excessive noise are not allowed in our locations. I
host_about: Sonder is reimagining the way people travel. Now in 20+ cities, we’ve been featured in The New York Times, The Wall Street Journal, and named 2019’s most innovative hospitality brand by Fast Company. We’ve taken the best parts of home and hotel and combined them into an entirely new experience. All of our spaces are uniquely designed, have 24/7 guest support, and contain all the essentials you need for an impeccable stay. No matter what you’re looking for, there’s a Sonder for you.

We’ve taken the best parts of home and hotel and combined them into an entirely new experience. All of our spaces are uniquely designed, have 24/7 guest support, and contain all the essentials you need for an impeccable stay. No matter what you’re looking for, there’s a Sonder for you.
